product_name: Bumble and bumbleHairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Hydrating Styling Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingThis styler delivers flexible hold, plus 3 days of hydration + frizz reduction for lasting style retention. With a Featherlight 6-Oil Blend + Nangai Oil, it offers humidity protection, prevents the formation of split ends by 2x (vs. untreated hair), and protects from heat tools up to 450Â°F/232Â°C.
details: DetailsBenefitsStyle retentionFrizz reductionSoftens + smoothesPrevents breakage + split endsHeat protectiveHigh-humidity protectionColor-safeKey IngredientsFeatherlight 6-Oil Blend: Provides conditioning, moisture, nourishment, softening, and smoothing.Nangai Oil: Offers frizz reductionResearch Results3 days of style retention*vs. untreated hairItem 2628530How To UseApply to damp hair. Style as desired.From the Pros: A little goes a long way. Start small and build until you find what you like. Makes a great companion to the Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Primer, a leave-in conditioner that detangles and hydrates.Formulated For: Patterns: Curly, Wavy, and Straight Diameters: Fine, Medium, Thick Conditions: Untreated, Color-Treated, Dry hair, or hair damaged from Heat, Chemical, or Physical styling Ideal for hair types seeking a styler with both lasting hydration and style retention.IngredientsILN: Ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau,Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Canarium Indicum Seed Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare) Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Arginine, Polyester-39, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Coumarin, Potassium SorbatePlease be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Unexpectedly awesome
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this from ULTA in one of those "gift with purchase" bags and decided to use it on a whim one day on my curly, blonde, unruly hair. It managed my frizz really well and didn't make my hair feel too weighed down while keeping the integrity of my curls intact.

reviews.headline: My first use
reviews.comments: This styling cream is nice-smelling, and not heavy texture. Since my shouldered-length hair is a kind of dry, grey-aged and fine, but it really does leave my hair manageable, soft and hydrated.

reviews.headline: Waves look great!
reviews.comments:
Quick factoid about me:
2a/2b hair, bleached, thin
So ive been on a hair care journey and ive been trying to find products that actually hold my wavy hair. Ive tried other gels, mousses, creams, spraysâ€¦. You name it theres a chance i have tried it. I mix a small amount with a mousse i really enjoy and let me tell youâ€¦. This really helped my hair. My hair smells great, my waves hold, and it helps the frizz a bit. I like to use it on my day 2/3 hair too and it still works great. When i diffuse my hair i usually like to keep it low/cool. Honestly i really enjoy this product and its rare that i give something 5 stars.

reviews.headline: Game changer for dry frizz prone hair
reviews.comments: I have what some refer to as Irish curls, waves here and there and straight.  It's also naturally silver.  It's prone to breakage and dryness, first time out yes a little goes a long way, I have shine and body to my hair.

reviews.headline: Low porosity beware!
reviews.comments: I have thick 3a/3b curls and no matter how much/little I use, this cream just sits on top of my hair. Every time I heat style after using I see an alarming amount of build up on my flat iron, which then burns (I use 350 and this is advertised to protect up to 450) and makes my hair smell awful even when wiping my iron every few passes (which is a shame because this smells so so lovely otherwise!).

reviews.headline: Won't buy again
reviews.comments: Last time I bought styling cream from B&B was in 2015. They've changed the formula since then. It doesn't have the hold after blow drying as it did before. The product scent doesn't stand out either.

reviews.headline: New favorite
reviews.comments: Tried this for a recent trip and will definitely purchase the full-size. Love that it has heat-protection and I was surprised at how soft it left my hair. And it's not heavy and has a nice light scent. Two thumbs up!

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: This cream get rid of any frizziness in my 3B curly hair and leaves it super shiny and moisturized. I always get comments about how great my hair smells. I do use a gel along with the cream for hold.

reviews.headline: Not fond of it
reviews.comments: Love their products, but this one missed the mark.  Smells good, hydrating, but has no styling properties at all.  No hold, so doesn't aid in styling, but smell and hydration are probably good for hair with more texture than mine.

reviews.headline: Didn't do anything good to my hair
reviews.comments: I tried to return this product but Ulta changed her policy and they wouldn't accept it after 30 days. I used it 3 times to see if I could see any good result but nothing happened. It didn't add any shine; it wouldn't give a nice shape to my hair and I had to use A LOT to feel it could maybe do something. Either way, leaving my hair looking lifeless was the worst for me. What do I do now with a bottle almost full of that? totally disappointed.

reviews.headline: Deflates volume
reviews.comments: I am a big BB fan, so I tried this product on my short wavy hair, which I blow-dry with a brush.  Above all my style requires volume, and I constantly am looking for a product that delivers both volume and shine (many volumizers remove shine).  I thought this product might work, but it doesn't:  it does add shine but adds no volume or shape, and, worse, it deflates any volume that I am able to get from any other product used in combination (mousse, gel).  I don't want soft hair, don't want curl - I want volume that retains the shape that I get from blowdrying.  This has the opposite effect.

reviews.headline: So nice!!!
reviews.comments: It smells so good my mouth is actually watering also it acruallt defines my waves which is so nice bc i feel like nothing ive tried has

reviews.headline: Didn't work in my hair at all
reviews.comments: My hair is dry, thick, wavy and porous. This product dried it more, didn't work at all.

media.headline: Makes my hair, soft, smooth, and beautiful

faceoff_positive.comments:
Raise your hand if you crave luscious, radiant locks that turn heads! Bb Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream is your secret weapon to transform your hair into a captivating masterpiece. Prepare to experience hair perfection like never before!

**A Featherweight Formula, a World of Results**

Glide this lightweight cream through your hair, and watch as it transforms into a silky, invisible veil. Its innovative formula blends precious oils â€“ Argan, coconut, safflower â€“ to create a barrier against frizz and protect from heat damage.

**Unleash Dazzling Shine and Softness**

Say goodbye to dull, lifeless hair! The Invisible Oil Styling Cream infuses your tresses with a radiant shine that will make everyone notice. Its conditioning properties nourish each strand, leaving you with hair so soft and touchable, you'll never want to put it up again.

**Effortless Styling Made Easy**

This versatile cream is your secret weapon for flawless styling. Whether you're aiming for sleek straight hair, voluminous blowouts, or effortless waves, the Invisible Oil Styling Cream makes it a breeze. It provides light hold and definition, leaving your hair looking polished and effortlessly chic.

**A Luxurious Treat for All Hair Types**

From fine and flyaway to coarse and curly, the Invisible Oil Styling Cream embraces all hair types. Its unique blend of oils nourishes and protects without weighing down your hair or leaving it greasy.

**Experience the Invisible Difference**

Once you try Bb Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream, you'll never go back to your old hair products. It's the perfect solution for anyone who wants:

* Radiant shine and frizz control
* Silky-smooth, manageable hair
* Effortless styling with light hold
* Protection from heat damage and UV rays

Indulge in the luxury of Bb Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Styling Cream and witness your hair transform into its most beautiful, healthy, and radiant self. 
#complimentary from bumbleandbumble
faceoff_positive.headline: Unleash Your Hair's Inner Shine

faceoff_negative.comments:
I recently received this Bb hairdressers invisible oil styling cream complimentary from BumbleandBumble in exchange for my honest review.   I have short hair and this styling cream does not make it greasy.   There is just a very light sweet fragrance, so not overpowering.   It does control frizz and make my hair feel soft to the touch.  
However, it's marketed as 'long lasting styling cream with style retention' and I have to say that hasn't been the case for me.   Beyond the frizz protection, my curls do not stay defined and I don't feel like there is a lasting hold.
faceoff_negative.headline: leaves hair very soft but no long lasting hold.

rollup.name: Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Long Last Hydrating Styling Cream
